name: Animal Lord, Mammoth Queen
description: The Mammoth Queen is a massive fey creature with an elephant-like humanoid form, exhibiting strength and majesty. She has a thick hide and tusks, embodying the essence of the wild and the fey.
memorable: Her ability to rejuvenate upon death and the unique characteristic of forbidding elephantine creatures from attacking her make her a compelling and formidable foe.
goals: To protect elephantine creatures and dominate the battlefield with her massive presence.
relations: Associated with other fey creatures and is a protector of mammoths and elephants.
environment: Primarily found in lush forests or remote wilderness areas where elephants roam.
strengths: High damage output, exceptional physical strength, magic resistance, and the ability to rejuvenate.
weaknesses: Average Dexterity may lead to susceptibility to agile opponents and traps.
attacks: Utilizes a variety of devastating attacks like Battleaxe strikes, powerful Gores, and Stomp abilities that deal significant damage and can incapacitate foes.
most_powerful_ability: Rejuvenation allows her to reform on the Astral Plane and inhabit another elephantine creature unless all are defeated.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 120 feet and a passive perception of 20, enabling her to detect hidden threats effectively.
skills: Skilled in perception, allowing her to notice unseen creatures and situations.
additional_information: Immune to cold and poison damage, and resistant to nonmagical physical attacks.
Legendary Resistance allows her to overcome difficult spells.
Possesses the ability to change her shape, retaining her combat stats.
Can perform powerful area attacks with her Tusk Sweep ability.
test_queries: massive fey creature with protective abilities
